sentences.en: every achievement needs time to complete, if there is not enough time , the goal would be prate.
sentences.cn: 一切成就都要靠时间完成，没有足够的时间做支撑，完成目标是空谈。

sentences.en: If the hen does not prate, she will not lay.
If we have a correct theory but merely prate with this complete, pigeonhole it and never put it into practice, then that theory, however good, is of no significance.
sentences.cn: 爱情誓言警句：如果有了正确的理论，只是把它空谈一阵，束之学习英语爱情谚语高阁，并不实行，那末，这种理论再好也是没有意义的。

sentences.en: Pen walked on, listening to his companion's prate, wondering, amused, and puzzled.
sentences.cn: 潘一路走去, 听他同伴喋喋不休, 觉得又惊讶有趣, 又有些困惑不解.

sentences.en: You prate of sentences having subjects, but all that sort of talk is out of date.
sentences.cn: 你大谈句子必须有主语，这种分类早就过时了。

words.tran_cn: 空谈者，闲扯的人；说半截话的人；饶舌的人

trans.tran_en: idle or trivial talk; prattle; chatter
to talk in a meaningless boring way about something
